title: Poro kings chest gave me a skin I already had
body: When I got the poro king chest and used it I received a skin permanent that I already had and it is now treated as a skin shard. Is this a bug? or am I just unlucky.

replies.body: Contents when crafting shards and fragments will result in a random permanent.  It sucks that you unlocked a repeat, but you can also disenchant it instead to unlock a shard you already have.  I hope that helps!
